alert.note: Alert for Malheur County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 2:59PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Owyhee and east central Malheur Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 359 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Malloy Ranch, or 35 miles southwest of Nampa, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Malloy Ranch around 410 PM MDT. Squaw Butte around 420 PM MDT. Rockville and Rockville School around 430 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
